allow: Bash(powershell -Command "(Get-Content mt-api.service.ts) -replace ""if \(response.data.code === ''2000''\) \{"", ''if (response.data.code == 2000) {'' | Set-Content mt-api.service.ts.tmp && Move-Item -Force mt-api.service.ts.tmp mt-api.service.ts")

Bash(cmd /c "C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe -uroot -proot -e ""SELECT id, mobile, province_name, city_name, item_codes FROM imaotai.mt_accounts a LEFT JOIN imaotai.reservation_configs c ON a.id = c.account_id;""")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -uroot -proot -e "SELECT id, mobile, province_name, city_name FROM imaotai.mt_accounts;")
Bash(cmd /c """C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe"" -uroot -proot imaotai -e ""SELECT id, mobile, province_name, city_name FROM mt_accounts;""")
